concept.title: Beermat
concept.shortdesc: The SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) creator/editor for Eclipse.

section.p:
Beermat is an Eclipse plugin, used to create and edit SVG (
) documents. It is a quick and easy way for developers to improve their documentation, by adding designs or ideas, without ever having to leave the IDE. The concept of Beermat is to capture designs and ideas of the developers and link the image to the code. At docfacto, we use it for system diagrams, architecture diagrams, class diagrams. We also use it for wire diagrams for UI's. It has a free hand mode for those white board design sessions that can be checked in with the code so future developers can see the history of the design process.
Although complicated diagrams can be drawn with Beermat is not meant to be a replacement for tools like Visio or Powerpoint, its meant to be simple!
